text: seonjijaneun junim-i gyesihan geos-eul mid-eumyeo ttohan mid-eum-eul gajinja geuleohadoda geudeul gagjaneun hananimgwa cheonsadeulgwa seongseodeulgwa seonjijadeul-eul mid-eumyeo ulineun seonjijadeul-eul chabyeolha ji anhdoda ulineun cheongchwihago bogjong hamyeo dangsin-ui yongseoleul guhanaida juyeo yeojeong-ui jongmal-eul dangsin-egelo dollinaida
